name: Tempest 1200
overview: This is an early DEMO of Tempest2000 for the Amiga, written by Elton Bird of Mental Software. Best played on a 28MHz or more A1200 with Fastmem. Lower spec. turn the fill OFF. I'm kind of stuck with what to do with it! If you have any interest in perhaps buying a finished version for a coverdisk, I'd be happy to hear any offers. Obviously the fact that it's an Atari game that's now out on PC and imminent on PSX/Saturn may be a problem for anything other than a PD release, but I think it's a little bit above being PD. Love to hear any feedback/suggestions. If you can, give me a ring and let me know what you think of it.
